title._content: Selection Committee for the Directorship February 1983

description._content: Standing left to right: Dr Meghnad Desai, Professor Stephen Nickell, Dr Colin Crouch, Sir John Burgh, Mr Peter Dawson, Professor Maurice Cranston. Seated left to right: Sir Frederick Dainton, Sir Huw Wheldon, Sir Anthony Part, Sir Richard Way. Professor W.a Cornish and Lord Roll were also a part of the committee but not available when the photograph was taken.
